sentences.en: "There you go again, upsetting the child!" said Shirley.
sentences.cn: “瞧，又来了不是？又惹孩子伤心！”雪莉说。

sentences.en: A child may not differentiate between his imagination and the real world.
sentences.cn: 儿童可能无法将自己的幻想与真实世界区分开来。

sentences.en: a famous writer of children’s books
sentences.cn: 著名的儿童文学作家

sentences.en: A good education gives your child a head start in life.
sentences.cn: 良好的教育会让你的孩子在人生的起跑线上比别人领先一步。

sentences.en: A spoilt child is rarely popular with other children.
sentences.cn: 被宠坏的孩子很难得到其他孩子的喜爱。

sentences.en: Any child who is caught will be kept in at playtime.
sentences.cn: 凡是被抓住的孩子在课间游戏时要被留在屋里。

sentences.en: child victims of war
sentences.cn: 战争受难儿童

sentences.en: Don't leave a child alone in a room with an open fire.
sentences.cn: 房间里有裸露的明火时，不要让孩子独处其中。

sentences.en: He stopped and watched with amusement to see the child so absorbed.
sentences.cn: 他停下来，饶有兴趣地看着孩子如此投入。

sentences.en: His house was the only settled home I had as a child.
sentences.cn: 他的房子是我儿时唯一固定的家。

sentences.en: Hugh glanced at the child on her mother's lap.
sentences.cn: 休瞥了一眼坐在她妈妈膝上的小女孩。

sentences.en: I have five children, all happily married.
sentences.cn: 我有五个孩子，他们的婚姻都很幸福。

sentences.en: I was very happy as a child (= when I was a child ) .
sentences.cn: 我小时候很幸福。

sentences.en: If we had a child, we'd be in really dire straits.
sentences.cn: 假如我们有了小孩，我们会真正陷入困境。

sentences.en: If your child's temperature rises, sponge her down gently with tepid water.
sentences.cn: 如果你孩子的体温上升，就用海绵蘸上温水轻轻地擦拭她的身体。

sentences.en: Somehow she'd always been a child in his mind, pure and virginal.
sentences.cn: 不知何故，她在他心里一直是个天真无邪的孩子。

sentences.en: The child kept her eyes fixed on the wall behind him.
sentences.cn: 这个小女孩眼睛一直紧盯着他身后的那堵墙。

sentences.en: The film is not suitable for children under 12.
sentences.cn: 这部影片不适合12岁以下的儿童观看。

sentences.en: The hotel is ideal for families with young children.
sentences.cn: 这家宾馆对带小孩的家庭再合适不过。

sentences.en: The sash, kimono, and other garments were made to fit a child.
sentences.cn: 腰带、和服和其他衣服都是儿童款的。

sentences.en: To this end the young child is forever watchful.
sentences.cn: 这个年纪不大的孩子为此始终保持警惕。
